des:
The Smart Comfort skill uses standard Alexa Smart Home thermostat voice commands to control your Thomson connected heaters.
You need to create your account and add your Thomson heaters into it prior to link to this skill.
The commands supported are the following:
Turn off and on your heaters
Check the heater target temperature
Set the heater target temperature
Ask for the temperature in the room / in the heater
